TEXT.TITLE: <VISTA MANAGEMENT INC> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Vista Management Inc said it has agreed to acquire General Energy Development Inc for over 2,200,000 dlrs in cash, with financing to come from mortgage loans on the National Auto Service Centers General Energy operates. Reuter
